original_title: Carmen, sin miedo a la libertad
overview: From the neighborhood of "Las 600" in Cartagena, Murcia, Carmen leads the first feminist gypsy women's association to fight against systemic racism and machismo. After breaking all the stereotypes, Carmen will deal with the pressure of having become the hope of her community to change things, while moving forward with her goals. Her strong personality, and her determination, will be the driving force to create a sense of resilience, unity and strength to keep fighting.
title: Carmen, No Fear of Freedom
